titles.title: Middle Class Dependent Care Fairness Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the phasedown of the credit percentage for the dependent care credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/2008--Introduced. Middle Class Dependent Care Fairness Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the mandatory reduction in the rate of the tax credit for household and dependent care services for taxpayers whose adjusted gross incomes exceed $15,000.
